Nice! This sure sounds awesome!

I've tried making cinematics in the past, but they have never been very good. Maybe because I'm not good at making cool plotlines such as this one. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

>

> I've tried making cinematics in the past, but they have never been very good. Maybe because I'm not good at making cool plotlines such as this one. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Unfortunately I'm not good at recording. I also have no editing program.
